com.epam.testapp.service

Interface INewsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NewsService

    public interface INewsService
    Interface for interaction between NewsAction and INewsDao

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      News fetchByID(int id)
      Gets a News bean from DAO by ID
      java.util.List<News> getList()
      Gets a list of News from DAO
      void remove(int[] newsToDelete)
      Removes News with corresponding IDs from DAO
      int save(News newsToSave)
      Saves news to DAO.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchByID

        News fetchByID(int id)
               throws ServiceException,
                      FetchByIdException
        Gets a News bean from DAO by ID
        Parameters:
        id - - id of required News
        Returns:
        News bean with corresponding ID
        Throws:
        ServiceException - when something wrong with DAO
        FetchByIdException - if news with corresponding ID not found

      • getList

        java.util.List<News> getList()
                             throws ServiceException
        Gets a list of News from DAO
        Returns:
        list of all news from DAO
        Throws:
        ServiceException - when something wrong with DAO

      • remove

        void remove(int[] newsToDelete)
            throws ServiceException
        Removes News with corresponding IDs from DAO
        Parameters:
        newsToDelete - - array with IDs of News to be deleted
        Throws:
        ServiceException - when something wrong with DAO

      • save

        int save(News newsToSave)
         throws ServiceException
        Saves news to DAO. If id of News bean sent as parameter == 0, then creates new persistent object. If id != 0, then updates existing object.
        Parameters:
        newsToSave - News bean to be saved
        Returns:
        ID of saved news
        Throws:
        ServiceException - when something wrong with DAO
